caseTitle: Telenor Microfinance Bank Limited v. Shamim Bano & others
tagline: Discussion: (1) Section 2, Clause (i), & Section 6 of Microfinance Institution Ordinance, 2001. (2) Section 3 & 4 of the Negotiable Instruments Act, 1881. (3) The promissory note is an instrument containing an unconditional undertaking. (4) The promissory note was an integral part of the finance agreement hence suit was maintainable under Order XXXVII CPC.
